review: Lenvima (lenvatinib):Started taking Lenvima about 36 months ago. No immediate side effect and 6 months later, I began losing weight via nausea/vomiting/diarrhea, for a total of 102 lbs. Not sure that's the best way to do it though. Painful right leg swelling makes it hard to get around, but a walker helps (bonus: you have an instant chair when you're waiting on slow lines!)Overall, there are many different little annoyances, but the bright side is you're still alive! Don't take it for granted!!
